description:
cmd/godoc: fix BUGS heading in text mode

All the headings are CAPS not Title.

Fixes issue 4843.

messages.text:
LGTM

On Wed, Mar 13, 2013 at 11:47 AM, <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev1,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> cmd/godoc: fix BUGS heading in text mode
>
> All the headings are CAPS not Title.
>
> Fixes issue 4843.
>
> Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.**com/7792043/<https://codereview.appspot.com/7792043/>
>
> Affected files:
>   M lib/godoc/package.txt
>
>
> Index: lib/godoc/package.txt
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/lib/godoc/package.txt
> +++ b/lib/godoc/package.txt
> @@ -65,7 +65,7 @@
>
>  */}}{{with $.Notes}}
>  {{range $marker, $content := .}}
> -{{noteTitle $marker}}s
> +{{$marker}}S
>
>  {{range $content}}{{comment_text . "    " "\t"}}
>  {{end}}{{end}}{{end}}{{end}}{{**/*
>
>
> --

> .
>
